author: terencechain
content: During ethcc week, a few convos were raised on how to improve network latency for a block. I see 3-10 times higher network latency for builder block to arrive, 300ms-1s on Kiln. This will be worse on slot0 and a more extensive network. Some nice improvements we can make are to have relayers gossip the block out and have builders cont streaming the block to the relayer
